title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 3 - Drivers' Licenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 3 - Drivers' Licenses

State Regulations
§ 3.1 - Introduction
§ 3.2 - Driver license classifications, endorsements and restrictions
§ 3.3 - General driver licensing procedure
§ 3.4 - Knowledge tests
§ 3.5 - Skills tests
§ 3.6 - Special procedures for commercial driver licenses (CDL)
§ 3.7 - Special procedures for motorcycle licenses
§ 3.8 - Photographic driver licenses
§ 3.9 - Social security number
§ 3.10 - Exemptions and miscellaneous provisions
§ 3.11 - Repealed
§ 3.12 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 3

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 215[a], 385[1][h], 490[3][a] [i], 501[2], 501-a, 502[1], [4], [6], 503[1], [2], 504[3], 508[1], [4], 1198

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
